name: Health:lga_profilesdata2011
title: Local Government Area (LGA) profiles data 2011

legal.licenceType: Creative Commons Attribution 3.0 Australia (CC BY 3.0 AU)

keyword: community profile, health, well being, quality of life, demographic, population, employment, social,Victoria,Department of Health and Human Services
abstract: The Local Government Area (LGA) profiles are produced annually to facilitate service planning and policy development by enabling access to a broad range of data about each LGA. Each profile includes population, socio-economic, services and health data relating to the LGA, provided by a range of sources.

selectedAttributes.name: lga_code
selectedAttributes.title: Local Government Area Code
selectedAttributes.description: Code of the local government area

selectedAttributes.name: number_of_schools
selectedAttributes.title: Number of schools
selectedAttributes.description: The number of schools located in the LGA. This item includes government private and Catholic primary and secondary schools. It also includes schools for children with special needs.

selectedAttributes.name: number_of_kindergartens
selectedAttributes.title: Number of kindergartens
selectedAttributes.description: The number of locations that provide a funded kindergarten program. This item includes long day-care centres that provide funded kindergarten programs as well as stand-alone kindergartens.

selectedAttributes.name: percpopulation_near_pt
selectedAttributes.title: %population near public transport
selectedAttributes.description: The percentage of the population that lives within 400 metres of a bus and/or tram stop and/or 800 metres of a train station.

selectedAttributes.name: pfi
selectedAttributes.title: Persistent Feature Identifier
selectedAttributes.description: Persistent Feature Identifier. Assigned at the creation of the feature and is retained for the life of the feature.

selectedAttributes.name: lga_name
selectedAttributes.title: Local Government Area Name
selectedAttributes.description: Name of the local government area

selectedAttributes.name: lga
selectedAttributes.title: Local Government Area Name
selectedAttributes.description: Name of the local government area

selectedAttributes.name: metro_rural
selectedAttributes.title: Metro/rural
selectedAttributes.description: This item specifies whether the local government area (LGA) is in a metropolitan or rural departmental region.

selectedAttributes.name: dh_region
selectedAttributes.title: DH region
selectedAttributes.description: The departmental region in which the LGA is located.

selectedAttributes.name: area_of_lga
selectedAttributes.title: Area of LGA (sq km)
selectedAttributes.description: The land area of the Local Government Area in square kilometres.

selectedAttributes.name: asgc_code
selectedAttributes.title: ASGC code
selectedAttributes.description: The numeric code for the LGA in the Australian Standard Geographical Classification.

selectedAttributes.name: most_populpus_community
selectedAttributes.title: Most populous community
selectedAttributes.description: The name of the town or suburb in the LGA with the largest population.

selectedAttributes.name: distance_to_melbourne
selectedAttributes.title: Distance to Melbourne
selectedAttributes.description: The distance by road to the most populous community in the LGA from the former Melbourne General Post Office (GPO) via the shortest practical route.

selectedAttributes.name: travel_time_to_melbourne
selectedAttributes.title: Travel time to Melbourne
selectedAttributes.description: The travel time in minutes to the most populous community in the LGA from the former Melbourne GPO via the quickest practical route.

selectedAttributes.name: remoteness_area
selectedAttributes.title: Remoteness area
selectedAttributes.description: The remoteness of the LGA as measured by the Accessibility/Remoteness Index of Australia (ARIA+).

selectedAttributes.name: aria_measures
selectedAttributes.title: ARIA measures (low/average/high)
selectedAttributes.description: The minimum average and maximum grid values in the LGA as provided by the ARIA+ product.

selectedAttributes.name: perc_business
selectedAttributes.title: %Business
selectedAttributes.description: The proportion of the LGAs total area assigned to business land use.

selectedAttributes.name: perc_industrial
selectedAttributes.title: %Industrial
selectedAttributes.description: The proportion of the LGAs total area assigned to industrial land use.

selectedAttributes.name: perc_residential
selectedAttributes.title: %Residential
selectedAttributes.description: The proportion of the LGAs total area assigned to residential land use.

selectedAttributes.name: perc_rural
selectedAttributes.title: %Rural
selectedAttributes.description: The proportion of the LGAs total area assigned to rural land use.

selectedAttributes.name: perc_other
selectedAttributes.title: %Other
selectedAttributes.description: The proportion of the LGAs total area not assigned to business industrial residential or rural land use.

selectedAttributes.name: per_annum_population_change_2000_2010
selectedAttributes.title: Per annum population change 2000-2010
selectedAttributes.description: The per annum population change for the LGA/region over the historic period 2000?2010.

selectedAttributes.name: per_annum_projected_population_change_2010_2022
selectedAttributes.title: Per annum projected population change 2010-2022
selectedAttributes.description: The per annum population change for the LGA/region over the projected period 2010?2022.

selectedAttributes.name: total_fertility_rate
selectedAttributes.title: Total fertility rate
selectedAttributes.description: The total fertility rate represents the average number of children that a woman in a particular LGA could expect to bear during her reproductive lifetime if current fertility rates in that LGA continue.

selectedAttributes.name: rank_total_fertility_rate
selectedAttributes.title: RANK total fertility rate
selectedAttributes.description: The rank of the LGA/region in relation to total fertility rate.

selectedAttributes.name: perc_atsi_population
selectedAttributes.title: %ATSI population
selectedAttributes.description: The percentage of the population who are identified as being Aboriginal or Torres Straits Islander in the Experimental Estimates of Aboriginal and Torres Strait Islander produced by the ABS.

selectedAttributes.name: rank_atsi_population
selectedAttributes.title: RANK ATSI population
selectedAttributes.description: The rank of the LGA/region in relation to ATSI population.

selectedAttributes.name: perc_born_overseas
selectedAttributes.title: %Born overseas
selectedAttributes.description: The percentage of the population who were born overseas.

selectedAttributes.name: rank_born_overseas
selectedAttributes.title: RANK born overseas
selectedAttributes.description: The rank of the LGA/region in relation to percentage of population born overseas.

selectedAttributes.name: perc_speak_lote
selectedAttributes.title: % speak LOTE at home
selectedAttributes.description: The percentage of the population who speak a language other than English at home.

selectedAttributes.name: rank_lote
selectedAttributes.title: RANK LOTE
selectedAttributes.description: The rank of the LGA/region in relation to percentage of population that speak a language other than English at home.

selectedAttributes.name: perc_low_english
selectedAttributes.title: % low English proficiency
selectedAttributes.description: The percentage of the population who indicated in the 2006 census that they spoke English ?not well? or ?not at all?.

selectedAttributes.name: rank_low_english
selectedAttributes.title: RANK low English proficiency
selectedAttributes.description: The rank of the LGA/region in relation to percentage of population with low English proficiency.

selectedAttributes.name: perc_anglo_saxon_celtic
selectedAttributes.title: %Anglo-saxon Celtic background
selectedAttributes.description: The percentage of the population aged 18 plus who have Anglo-Saxon or Celtic background derived from data provided by the OriginsInfo segmentation tool which classifies names according to their most likely cultural origins.

selectedAttributes.name: rank_anglo_saxon_celtic
selectedAttributes.title: RANK Anglo-saxon Celtic
selectedAttributes.description: The rank of the LGA/region in relation to percentage of population with Anglo-saxon Celtic background.

selectedAttributes.name: new_settler
selectedAttributes.title: New settler arrivals per 100000 population
selectedAttributes.description: The number of arrivals from overseas per 100000 population during the 2010?11 financial year under the permanent resident visa category.

selectedAttributes.name: rank_new_settler
selectedAttributes.title: RANK new settler arrivals
selectedAttributes.description: The rank of the LGA/region in relation to new settler arrivals per 100000 population.

selectedAttributes.name: perc_humanitarian
selectedAttributes.title: %Humanitarian arrivals
selectedAttributes.description: The number of individuals arriving from overseas under the permanent resident visa category of humanitarian.

selectedAttributes.name: rank_humanitarian
selectedAttributes.title: RANK humanitarian arrivals
selectedAttributes.description: The rank of the LGA/region in relation to humanitarian arrivals as a percentage of new settlers.

selectedAttributes.name: perc_multiculturalism
selectedAttributes.title: % believe multiculturalism makes life better
selectedAttributes.description: The percentage of the LGA population that feels multiculturalism makes life in their area better.

selectedAttributes.name: rank_multiculturalism
selectedAttributes.title: RANK believe multiculturalism makes life better
selectedAttributes.description: The rank of the LGA/region in relation to percentage of population that believes multiculturalism makes life better.

selectedAttributes.name: irsed
selectedAttributes.title: IRSED
selectedAttributes.description: A measure of relative socio-economic disadvantage in a given geographic area.

selectedAttributes.name: rank_irsed
selectedAttributes.title: RANK IRSED
selectedAttributes.description: The rank of the LGA/region in relation to Index of Relative Socio-economic Disadvantage.

selectedAttributes.name: perc_households
selectedAttributes.title: % of households with income <$650 per week
selectedAttributes.description: The percentage of households with a gross total income of less than $650 per week. Only incomes of household members aged 15 years and over are included in the household total.

selectedAttributes.name: rank_households
selectedAttributes.title: RANK households with internet connected
selectedAttributes.description: The rank of the LGA/region in relation to percentage of households with internet connected.

selectedAttributes.name: gaming_machine_losses
selectedAttributes.title: Gaming machine losses per head of population
selectedAttributes.description: The total amount of money lost on electronic gaming machines that are located in an LGA per head of adult population.

selectedAttributes.name: rank_gaming_machine_losses
selectedAttributes.title: RANK gaming machine losses
selectedAttributes.description: The rank of the LGA/region in relation to gaming machine losses per head of adult population.

selectedAttributes.name: family_incidents
selectedAttributes.title: Family incidents per 1000 population
selectedAttributes.description: The number of family violence incidents reported to police per 1000 population. Incidents are not necessarily offences typically only about 25% of incidents result in a formal charge.

selectedAttributes.name: rank_family_incidents
selectedAttributes.title: RANK family incidents per 1000 population
selectedAttributes.description: The rank of the LGA/region in relation to family violence incidents per 1000 population.

selectedAttributes.name: drug_usage_possession
selectedAttributes.title: Drug usage/ possession offences per 1000 population
selectedAttributes.description: The number of offences per 1000 population involving the possession or use of drugs. Provided as a number per postcode and converted to LGA by DH.

selectedAttributes.name: rank_drug_usage_possession
selectedAttributes.title: RANK drug usage/ possession offences per 1000 population
selectedAttributes.description: The rank of the LGA/region in relation to drug usage and possession offences per 1000 population.

selectedAttributes.name: total_offences
selectedAttributes.title: Total offences per 1000 population
selectedAttributes.description: The total number of offences per 1000 population. Includes crime against person crime against property drug offences and other crime. Provided as a number per postcode and converted to LGA by DH.

selectedAttributes.name: rank_total_offences
selectedAttributes.title: RANK total offences per 1000 population
selectedAttributes.description: The rank of the LGA/region in relation to total number of offences per 1000 population.

selectedAttributes.name: perc_feel_safe
selectedAttributes.title: % who feel safe on street after dark
selectedAttributes.description: The percentage of the population who say they feel safe walking down their street alone after dark.

selectedAttributes.name: rank_feel_safe
selectedAttributes.title: RANK feel safe on street after dark
selectedAttributes.description: The rank of the LGA/region in relation to percentage of population who feel safe on their street alone after dark.

selectedAttributes.name: perc_volunteers
selectedAttributes.title: % of population which volunteers
selectedAttributes.description: The percentage of the population aged 15 or over who indicated that they did voluntary work through an organisation or group in the twelve months prior to the 2006 Census.

selectedAttributes.name: rank_volunteers
selectedAttributes.title: RANK population which volunteers
selectedAttributes.description: The rank of the LGA/region in relation to percentage of population who help out as a volunteer.

selectedAttributes.name: perc_membership_groups
selectedAttributes.title: % of population with membership of organised groups
selectedAttributes.description: The percentage of the population who say they are a member of an organised group such as a sports or church group or another community organisation or professional organisation.

selectedAttributes.name: rank_membership_groups
selectedAttributes.title: RANK membership of organised groups
selectedAttributes.description: The rank of the LGA/region in relation to percentage of population with membership of an organised group.

selectedAttributes.name: perc_parents_schools
selectedAttributes.title: % of parents who participate in schools
selectedAttributes.description: The percentage of parents who have school-aged children who say they are actively involved with activities at their child/childrens school/s.

selectedAttributes.name: rank_parents_schools
selectedAttributes.title: RANK parents who participate in schools
selectedAttributes.description: The rank of the LGA/region in relation to percentage of parents involved in schools.

selectedAttributes.name: perc_population_good_facilities_services
selectedAttributes.title: % of population who believe the area has good facilities and services
selectedAttributes.description: The percentage of the LGA population which believes that there are good facilities and services in the LGA like shops childcare schools and libraries.

selectedAttributes.name: rank_population_good_facilities_services
selectedAttributes.title: RANK believe the area has good facilities and services
selectedAttributes.description: The rank of the LGA/region in relation to percentage of population who believe the LGA has good facilities.

selectedAttributes.name: unemployment_rate
selectedAttributes.title: Unemployment rate
selectedAttributes.description: The percentage of the labour force which is unemployed.

selectedAttributes.name: rank_unemployment_rate
selectedAttributes.title: RANK unemployment rate
selectedAttributes.description: The rank of the LGA/region in relation to unemployment rate.

selectedAttributes.name: perc_individual_income
selectedAttributes.title: % of persons with individual income <$400 per week
selectedAttributes.description: The percentage of the population aged 15 and over with a gross individual income of less than $400 per week and the proportion of these who are female/male.

selectedAttributes.name: rank_individual_income
selectedAttributes.title: RANK individual income <$400
selectedAttributes.description: The rank of the LGA/region in relation to individual income < $400 per week.

selectedAttributes.name: perc_female_low_income
selectedAttributes.title: % female low income
selectedAttributes.description: The female proportion of the population aged 15 and over with a gross individual income of less than $400 per week.

selectedAttributes.name: perc_male_low_income
selectedAttributes.title: % male low income
selectedAttributes.description: The male proportion of the population aged 15 and over with a gross individual income of less than $400 per week.

selectedAttributes.name: perc_one_parent_families
selectedAttributes.title: % families headed by one parent
selectedAttributes.description: The percentage of families which were headed by a single parent.

selectedAttributes.name: rank_one_parent_families
selectedAttributes.title: RANK one-parent families
selectedAttributes.description: The rank of the LGA/region in relation to percentage of one-parent headed families.

selectedAttributes.name: perc_female_one_parent_families
selectedAttributes.title: % female one-parent families
selectedAttributes.description: The proportion of one-parent headed families which were headed by a female single parent.

selectedAttributes.name: perc_male_one_parent_families
selectedAttributes.title: % male one-parent families
selectedAttributes.description: The proportion of one-parent headed families which were headed by a male single parent.

selectedAttributes.name: perc_households_income_650
selectedAttributes.title: % of households with income <$650 per week
selectedAttributes.description: The percentage of households with a gross total income of less than $650 per week. Only incomes of household members aged 15 years and over are included in the household total.

selectedAttributes.name: rank_households_income_650
selectedAttributes.title: RANK households with income <$650 per week
selectedAttributes.description: The rank of the LGA/region in relation to household income < $650 per week.

selectedAttributes.name: perc_low_income_families
selectedAttributes.title: % low income families with children
selectedAttributes.description: Welfare-dependant and other low income families with children (as a percentage of all families).

selectedAttributes.name: rank_low_income_families
selectedAttributes.title: RANK low income families with children
selectedAttributes.description: The rank of the LGA/region in relation to families with children in low income households .

selectedAttributes.name: perc_population_food_insecurity
selectedAttributes.title: % population with food insecurity
selectedAttributes.description: The percentage of people who ran out of food in the last twelve months and could not afford to buy more.

selectedAttributes.name: rank_population_food_insecurity
selectedAttributes.title: RANK population with food insecurity
selectedAttributes.description: The rank of the LGA/region in relation to population with food insecurity.

selectedAttributes.name: perc_housing_costs_40perc__income
selectedAttributes.title: % of households with housing costs >40% of income
selectedAttributes.description: The percentage of households where more than 40% of weekly household income is spent on housing costs.

selectedAttributes.name: rank_housing_costs_40perc__income
selectedAttributes.title: RANK households with housing costs >40% of income
selectedAttributes.description: The rank of the LGA/region in relation to housing costs > 40% of income.

selectedAttributes.name: perc_affordable_rental_housing
selectedAttributes.title: % of rental housing that is affordable
selectedAttributes.description: The percentage of housing available for rental within the LGA which is affordable for lower income families.

selectedAttributes.name: rank_affordable_rental_housing
selectedAttributes.title: RANK rental housing that is affordable
selectedAttributes.description: The rank of the LGA/region in relation to affordable rental housing.

selectedAttributes.name: median_house_price
selectedAttributes.title: Median house price
selectedAttributes.description: The value of the middle item when all sale prices are arranged in ascending order of magnitude.

selectedAttributes.name: rank_median_house_price
selectedAttributes.title: RANK median house price
selectedAttributes.description: The rank of the LGA/region in relation to median house price.

selectedAttributes.name: median_rent_3room
selectedAttributes.title: Median rent for 3 bedroom house
selectedAttributes.description: The median weekly rent for a 3 bedroom house located in the LGA.

selectedAttributes.name: rank_median_rent_3room
selectedAttributes.title: RANK median rent for 3 bedroom house
selectedAttributes.description: The rank of the LGA/region in relation to median rent for a 3 bedroom house.

selectedAttributes.name: new_dwellings
selectedAttributes.title: New dwellings per 1000 population
selectedAttributes.description: The number of new dwellings approved for construction per 1000 population. This measure provides an indicator of economic activity and growth in the LGA.

selectedAttributes.name: rank_new_dwellings
selectedAttributes.title: RANK new dwellings per 1000 population
selectedAttributes.description: The rank of the LGA/region in relation to new dwelling approvals per 1000 population.

selectedAttributes.name: social_housing
selectedAttributes.title: Social housing as a percentage of total dwellings
selectedAttributes.description: The percentage of dwellings which are social housing stock.

selectedAttributes.name: rank_social_housing
selectedAttributes.title: RANK social housing as a percentage of total dwellings
selectedAttributes.description: The rank of the LGA/region in relation to percentage of dwellings that are social housing stock.

selectedAttributes.name: perc_dwellings_no_motor_vehicle
selectedAttributes.title: % dwellings with no motor vehicle
selectedAttributes.description: The percentage of private occupied dwellings with no motor vehicle.

selectedAttributes.name: rank_dwellings_no_motor_vehicle
selectedAttributes.title: RANK dwellings with no motor vehicle
selectedAttributes.description: The rank of the LGA/region in relation to percentage of households with no motor vehicle.

selectedAttributes.name: passenger_vehicles
selectedAttributes.title: Passenger vehicles per 1000 population
selectedAttributes.description: The number of passenger vehicles per 1000 population.

selectedAttributes.name: rank_passenger_vehicles
selectedAttributes.title: RANK passenger vehicles per 1000 population
selectedAttributes.description: The rank of the LGA/region in relation to passenger vehicles per 1000 population.

selectedAttributes.name: perc_motor_vehicles_10old
selectedAttributes.title: % motor vehicles more than ten years old
selectedAttributes.description: The percentage of total passenger vehicles registered in that LGA which are more than 10 years old. The data is from the Motor Vehicle Census undertaken by the ABS on 31 January 2011.

selectedAttributes.name: rank_motor_vehicles_10old
selectedAttributes.title: RANK motor vehicles more than ten years old
selectedAttributes.description: The rank of the LGA/region in relation to passenger vehicles more than ten years old.

selectedAttributes.name: household_recycling_diversion_rate
selectedAttributes.title: Household recycling diversion rate
selectedAttributes.description: Recycle diversion rate equals the tonnes of recyclables and green organics collected (less contaminants) divided by the total tonnes of garbage recyclables and green organics collected.

selectedAttributes.name: rank_household_recycling_diversion_rate
selectedAttributes.title: RANK household recycling diversion rate
selectedAttributes.description: The rank of the LGA/region in relation to household recycle diversion rate.

selectedAttributes.name: household_garbage_yield
selectedAttributes.title: Household garbage yield (kg)
selectedAttributes.description: The average number of kilograms of garbage produced per year by each household in the LGA.

selectedAttributes.name: rank_household_garbage_yield
selectedAttributes.title: RANK household garbage yield
selectedAttributes.description: The rank of the LGA/region in relation to household garbage yield.

selectedAttributes.name: fte_students
selectedAttributes.title: FTE students
selectedAttributes.description: The number of full-time equivalent students enrolled in schools which are located within the LGA.

selectedAttributes.name: perc_9_students_min_reading
selectedAttributes.title: % year 9 students who attain national minimum standards in reading
selectedAttributes.description: The percentage of year 9 students who achieved at or above the national minimum standards in reading in the National Assessment Program ? Literacy and Numeracy (NAPLAN).

selectedAttributes.name: rank_9_students_min_reading
selectedAttributes.title: RANK year 9 students who attain national minimum standards in reading
selectedAttributes.description: The rank of the LGA/region in relation to year 9 students who attain national minimum standards in reading.

selectedAttributes.name: perc_9_students_min_writing
selectedAttributes.title: % year 9 students who attain national minimum standards in writing
selectedAttributes.description: The percentage of year 9 students who achieved at or above the national minimum standards in writing in the National Assessment Program ? Literacy and Numeracy (NAPLAN).

selectedAttributes.name: rank_9_students_min_writing
selectedAttributes.title: RANK year 9 students who attain national minimum standards in writing
selectedAttributes.description: The rank of the LGA/region in relation to year 9 students who attain national minimum standards in writing.

selectedAttributes.name: perc_9_students_min_numeracy
selectedAttributes.title: % year 9 students who attain national minimum standards in numeracy
selectedAttributes.description: The percentage of year 9 students who achieved at or above the national minimum standards in numeracy in the National Assessment Program ? Literacy and Numeracy (NAPLAN).

selectedAttributes.name: rank_9_students_min_numeracy
selectedAttributes.title: RANK year 9 students who attain national minimum standards in numeracy
selectedAttributes.description: The rank of the LGA/region in relation to year 9 students who attain national minimum standards in numeracy.

selectedAttributes.name: perc_pop_not_complete_year_12
selectedAttributes.title: % of population who did not complete year 12
selectedAttributes.description: The percentage of people aged 15 years and over who did not attend school or attended school but did not complete year 12.

selectedAttributes.name: rank_pop_not_complete_year_12
selectedAttributes.title: RANK population who did not complete year 12
selectedAttributes.description: The rank of the LGA/region in relation to percentage of population who did not complete year 12.

selectedAttributes.name: perc_pop_higher_education
selectedAttributes.title: % of population with higher education qualification
selectedAttributes.description: The percentage of people aged 15 years and over who have attained a definitive higher education qualification including a post-graduate degree- a graduate diploma a graduate certificate or a bachelor degree.

selectedAttributes.name: rank_pop_higher_education
selectedAttributes.title: RANK population with higher education qualification
selectedAttributes.description: The rank of the LGA/region in relation to percentage of population with a higher education qualification.

selectedAttributes.name: perc_students_government_school
selectedAttributes.title: % students attending a government school
selectedAttributes.description: The percentage of all primary and secondary school students resident in the LGA who attend a government school (rather than an independent or Catholic school).

selectedAttributes.name: rank_students_government_school
selectedAttributes.title: RANK students attending a government school
selectedAttributes.description: The rank of the LGA/region in relation to percentage of school children attending a government school.

selectedAttributes.name: low_birth_weight_babies
selectedAttributes.title: Low birth weight babies
selectedAttributes.description: The percentage of babies weighing less than 2500 grams at birth. Includes both live and still born.

selectedAttributes.name: rank_low_birth_weight_babies
selectedAttributes.title: RANK low birth weight babies
selectedAttributes.description: The rank of the LGA/region in relation to percentage of Low birth weight babies.

selectedAttributes.name: perc_persons_reporting_asthma
selectedAttributes.title: % persons reporting asthma
selectedAttributes.description: The percentage of persons who reported that they had symptoms of asthma in the 12 months before the Victorian Population Health Survey 2008.

selectedAttributes.name: rank_persons_reporting_asthma
selectedAttributes.title: RANK persons reporting asthma
selectedAttributes.description: The rank of the LGA/region in relation to percentage of population with current asthma.

selectedAttributes.name: perc_persons_reporting_type_2_diabetes
selectedAttributes.title: % persons reporting type 2 diabetes
selectedAttributes.description: The percentage of persons who reported that they had been told by a doctor that they had type 2 diabetes.
